info.name: Neon-Street
info.description:
This STYLE is for Tumblr, Google and Global.
Based on the dark color, and LINKs shines in bright colors.

I made in the image of the neon city at night.
info.additionalInfo:
Since I do not speak English, please Let me go strange sentence X( ■Assign colors (Identification is not accurate...)
  • The color of LINKs like this:
    • Blue(Cyan): normal
    • Green(Lime): visited
    • Purple(Magenta): target image
    • Yellow(Orange): script,etc
  • The shine color of HOVER-LINKs like this:
    • Blue(Cyan): normal
    • Green(Lime): new window(tab)
    • Purple(Magenta): target image
    • Yellow(Orange): script,etc
■Numbering Tumblr post, Google hit and more... ・Sep 20,2013: Google logo changes, other minor amendment
